snippet: A new 18,000-square-foot visitors’ center opens on Sunday at the Shelburne Museum in Vermont, capitalizing on the institution’s quirky holdings and expanding its educational mission.
abstract: Edward Rothstein reviews inaugural exhibition of new visitors’ center at Shelburne Museum in Shelburne, Vt.
lead_paragraph: A new 18,000-square-foot visitors’ center opens on Sunday at the Shelburne Museum in Vermont, capitalizing on the institution’s quirky holdings and expanding its educational mission.

headline.seo: Shelburne Museum Is Opening a New Visitors Center
headline.main: A Haven for Wit and Whimsy Dusts Off Its Welcome Mat
headline.print_headline: A Haven for Wit and Whimsy Dusts Off Its Welcome Mat

keywords.value: Pizzagalli Center for Art and Education (Shelburne Museum)
keywords.name: organizations
